title: Advanced Language Learning Design Based on Infographic Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language analysis skills and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for strengthening language structure visualization and information reorganization capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can visualize complex linguistic data as infographics and extract at least three core concepts.
Learners can apply critical thinking (analysis/evaluation/creation) during the infographic production process to explain linguistic patterns with 80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively communicate over 90% of the learning content to peer evaluators and instructors through infographics produced as final deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
